thread.title_full: Must-see: Mad dad slams Common Core with hilarious check to... | www.ajc.com

author: Matt Naham
title: Must-see: Mad dad slams Common Core with hilarious check to...
text:
Common Core is often at the center of controversy. From a father with a degree in engineering defending his son in writing to a model putting in her two cents or people taking 56 seconds to solve 9+6 , many have come down on Common Core, arguing that it lacks common sense.
>> Read more trending stories
IJ Review picked up on a tweet Friday of another Common Core jab made by a man in Ohio.
This check is written out in “Common Core math” to Millridge Elementary School with the thinking that if the school “wants to cash it, it’s going to have to explain to the bank cashier how it works,” IJ Review wrote .
>> See the viral image here
Parents fed up with Common Core math roasted it with a hilarious check you have to see http://t.co/kRYkDgBYfO pic.twitter.com/1YHSy3UdGf
— Rare (@Rare) September 18, 2015
